multiple_attempts_failure: I'm having a bit of trouble processing that right now. Could you try asking in a slightly different way?
empty_response: Hmm, I'm not sure I understood that correctly. Could you rephrase your question?
generic_error: Oops! Something went wrong on my end. Mind trying again?
guild_only_error: That command only works in Discord servers, not in direct messages!
permission_denied: I don't seem to have permission to do that. Could you check my role permissions?
feature_disabled: That feature isn't available right now. Sorry about that!
